installedMods.name: BeatSaverDownloader
installedMods.description: Enables you to download songs from BeatSaver in-game. Mod by: andruzzzhka

installedMods.name: BSIPA
installedMods.description: The new mod loader for Beat Saber. Provides a number of useful tools and features for mods to use.
installedMods.author: DaNike_

installedMods.name: ScoreSaber
installedMods.description: Allows you to upload scores to an online leaderboard and compare scores with others. Mod by: Umbranox
installedMods.author: Umbranox

installedMods.name: SongLoader
installedMods.description: A plugin for adding custom songs into Beat Saber.
installedMods.author: Kyle 1413
